meta_description: Value for exchange-correlation (XC) potential energy: the integral of the first
order derivative of the functional stored in xc_functional (integral of v_xc*
electron_density), i.e., the component of XC that is in the sum of the
eigenvalues. Values are given for each self-consistent field (SCF) iteration (i.
e., not the converged value, the latter being stored in energy_xc_potential).
